AltName.entry: PEDAL PUSHERS, THE SHEFFIELD CYCLE CAMPAIGN (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Supports all kinds of cycling in the Sheffield area. Works with Sheffield City Council and other interested parties to encourage the creation of a strategic cycle network for the city. Organises social events and rides. Also has an email discussion group, helps new cyclists and runs stalls at festivals. Offers training to adults and children from complete beginners to able cyclists through the Pedal Ready training group.
